segments.text: Devi , do you have any preference for where you would like to go for dinner for your birthday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't really know where I want to go . I am having trouble thinking of a particular restaurant .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There is a great restaurant directory here in the weekend section of the newspaper .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , we could look at that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have a particular type of food that you would like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I really like Japanese or Thai food .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That Japanese restaurant , Shogun , got good reviews .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh yeah ! I saw a review of that restaurant on television . The reviewer loved it !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would that be a place that you might like to go to for your birthday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That would work out great ! Why don't we call and get a reservation ?
segments.speaker: S2
